cn.jiguang.imui.messages

Class MsgListAdapter.HoldersConfig

  • java.lang.Object
    • cn.jiguang.imui.messages.MsgListAdapter.HoldersConfig
  • Enclosing class:
    MsgListAdapter<MESSAGE extends IMessage>

    public static class MsgListAdapter.HoldersConfig
extends java.lang.Object
    Holders Config Config your custom layouts and view holders into adapter. You need instantiate HoldersConfig, otherwise will use default MessageListStyle.
